description: Big enough to cover the whole picnic table at a campsite, yet light enough to carry into the alpine. The MSR Rendezvous Sun Shield 200 Wing can shelter 6 to 12 people for sleeping, cooking and eating. When rigged, its unique 7-point inverted wing design stays taut and stable in high winds. Pitch it with the included poles or use paddles, trees, lines or trekking poles.Fabric provides 50+ UPF sun protection.7-point inverted wing shape is stable in windy settings.Includes 2 lightweight 22mm diameter aluminum poles that compact to 64cm.Reinforced guy-out points let you support it with trekking poles, trees or paddles.Includes 7 MSR Cyclone stakes and 7 lengths of 2.3mm reflective guy-out line with aluminum tensioners.Provides 18.6 square meters (200 square feet) of coverage.
name: MSR Rendezvous Sun Shield 200 Wing
